txt.en: The farmlands of Marton burn, torched by the marauding Orcs that conquered the town.\n\nA well stands nearby. You should draw water from the well and douse the flames.

The well stands in the farmlands, and the fires burn rampant in the fields at the farms surrounding Marton (to the east, south-west, and north-west).\n\nYou should draw water from the well and douse the fires.
The farmlands of Marton burn, torched by the marauding Orcs that conquered the town.
You have put out a number of fires in Marton's farmlands. There is hope for the lands, if the people of the Westfold can endure this war.
Marton Farmlands: Fires in the Fields
You have put out a number of fires in Marton's farmlands. There is hope for the lands, if the people of the Westfold can endure this war.

The well stands in the farmlands, and the fires burn rampant in the fields at the farms surrounding Marton (to the east, south-west, and north-west).\n\nYou should draw water from the well and douse the fires.
Draw water from the well and douse fires in the fields ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Draw water from the well and douse fires
